subject: Re: [junit] How to write test cases for private methods using Junit
msgSnippet: ... That question is answered in the JUnit Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) document. A copy of the document, or at least a link to it, should have been
messageBody:
On 10/6/06, Anila.Mathew@... <Anila.Mathew@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I am new to this group. I would like to know if I can write junit
> tests for private methods.

That question is answered in the JUnit Frequently Asked Questions
(FAQ) document. A copy of the document, or at least a link to it,
should have been provided to you when you joined this mailing list.
For your convenience, here is the link to the FAQ:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm

You may also find it useful to read the following:

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/18032

concerning "The finer points of JUnit mailing list etiquette".

Simon

--
simonpeter.org | simonpeter.com | techbook.info
